author: geirm
msg: Doesn't suck now, and it only took 11 hours :)

author: jstrachan
msg: DynaTags are now supported properly. This means that template tags can now use their attributes via EL expressions. Just need to get the invokeBody tag working and dynamic/template tags are looking good

author: jstrachan
msg: Dynamic tags are just about working now. Need to support DynaTag in the tag invocation mechanism and need to figure out a neat way to implement the InvokeBodyTag, to associate the tag with the correct dynamic tags instance. Other than that just about there

author: jstrachan
msg: Added the 'define' tag library which allows new tags to be defined at runtime, allowing dynamic tags to be created as well as using Jelly scripts to write macro or template definitions. This isn't tested yet but most of the code is just about there.
